subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4.6 is released
msgSnippet: Fantastic! Any plans for uploading to Maven 2 repos? Thanks, Paul.
messageBody:
Fantastic! Any plans for uploading to Maven 2 repos?

Thanks, Paul.

David Saff wrote:
>
>
>
> All,
>
> JUnit 4.6 is now released! There are a few bug fixes included, and
> improvements to the core architecture that allow test reordering and
> parallelization for basic JUnit 3 and basic JUnit 4 tests and suites.
> For details, please see the release notes.
>
> Release notes:
> https://sourceforge.net/project/shownotes.php?release_id=675664&group_id=15278
> <https://sourceforge.net/project/shownotes.php?release_id=675664&group_id=15278>
>
> Download:
> https://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=15278&package_id=12472
> <https://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=15278&package_id=12472>
>
> Share and Enjoy,
>
> Kent Beck and David Saff
>
>
